patthana8.16:4.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:4.2: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:4.3: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.16:5.1: Naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:5.2: Naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:5.3: Naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.16:6.1: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:6.2: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:6.3: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
